item.description:
Join us to take a look at the nuts and bolts of blogging platforms that have changed the way in which individuals publish to the world. We will review WordPress and Moveable Type - platforms that you can host, in addition to hosted solutions like Blogger and MSN Spaces. We will compare and contrast the administration, easy of use, customization, user interface development capabilities of each solution.

In addition to the platform review we will also take a look at organizations offering ways in new companies like HubSpot are turning blogging engines into marketing machines for targeted lead generation. If you have another platform that you would like to speak about let us know, as we would love to learn!

We will provide drinks and snacks. Help here is definitely welcome as well, so drop us a line if you can help out.
item.how_to_find_us: http://www3.babson.edu/Visiting/CampusMap.cfm Best parking for no tickets is at the top level of the parking deck. Drive past Olin Turn left at the end. Go straight and turn right onto the rooftop level of the parking deck. Questions? 6175103590
item.why: Learn about the latest in blogging platforms and meet great, energetic, creative and entrepreneurial folks!

group.name: The Boston Computing Review Meetup Group

item.name: Self Publishing - Blogging Platform Extravaganza
